channel.title: claresholm on the dubious monk
channel.description: Recent content in claresholm on the dubious monk

item.title: the range gravel race 2024
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Claresholm, Alberta Course: ridewithgpslink Back when I was thinking about the bike riding I wanted to do this year, a gravel event was on my mind. The idea with a gravel race is it’s a long route on dirt roads away from traffic. There’s a mass start and though there are fast people “racing” the event there will be far more just out there doing the ride, trying to finish and have a good time1.
